comments: Had nursery at Clapton, London and show room at King's Road, Chelsea, London.
examples: Correa pulchella Mackay ex Sweet, Fl. Australas.: t.1 (1827).  Grevillea manglesii J.B.Mackay ex Heynh., Nomencl. Bot. Hort., 1: 378 (1840).
source: Desmond, Dict. Brit. Irish Bot. Hort. (1994).  Willson, Eleanor Joan, "West London Nursery Gardens": 105-106 (1982).
